name: Junk Slam
description:
In the year 2030, an unknown threat invades the planet. 

You pilot the world's last hope... a ship designed to use junk scattered from the Great War and penetrate the invader's barriers in hopes of finding the Promised Lands. 

Theme Pitch: The More Parts You Gather With Your Ship, The Stronger You Are

Team Size: 3

Names: Victor Burgos, Michael Harris, and Ahmad Bilal.

Engine: Unreal Engine 4

----

You use WSAD and your LMB on your mouse. 

  • W = Up
  • A = Left
  • S = Down
  • D = RIght
  • LMB = Grab Object In Range (Green Highlight)

----

Here are some tips:

  • Don't crash into the water or rocks.
  • Don't fall for traps.
  • Don't lose your stuff. 
  • Do get as much stuff as possible before you hit the barrier.
  • Do get the ones with the most value (determined by size)
  • While size truly does matter, Do make sure to balance yourself.
